Instead, the ∑∫ỹriȱŋ can build Sanctuaries, which will provide resources based on the amount of adjacent animals. Lastly, the ∑∫ỹriȱŋ don’t get Giants, but get flying Dragons, instead, which must grow up from an egg before they can be used.
